attributes.action: Make our National teams matches available to everyone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: English Football should be available for the whole nation to watch on either the BBC or ITV. The FA should not be allowed to sell the broadcasting rights to any subscription only channels. We, as a nation, should have the right to watch and support our national team without paying an additional £15 per month for the privelage.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
